definition: ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome
meat/flesh/pulp (of a fruit)/(coll.) (of a fruit) squashy/(of a person) flabby/irresolute/Kangxi radical 130
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: Tongliao Museum of Han Shan tea this beef jerky, 25 pound.
sentences.chinese: 通遼的罕山奶茶館有這種牛肉乾，25一斤。

sentences.english: Jerky is undergoing something of a renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 牛肉乾正在經歷一次復興。

sentences.english: The vacuum-packed beef jerky tastes really well.
sentences.chinese: 這種真空包裝的牛肉乾真的非常好喫。

sentences.english: I know man, let's go in and get some beef jerky.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，夥計，我們進去喫點牛肉乾吧。

sentences.english: Inside the boxes are packages full of beef jerky.
sentences.chinese: 在盒子裏全是一包包的牛肉乾。

sentences.english: Then he had some beef jerky and drinks.
sentences.chinese: 他吃了幾塊牛肉乾，並喝了一些飲料。

sentences.english: Beef jerky is also a nice choice.
sentences.chinese: 牛肉乾也是一種不錯的選擇。

sentences.english: Xin Zhao can blow bubbles with beef jerky.
sentences.chinese: 趙信能用牛肉乾吹泡泡。

sentences.english: They sat around the campfire eating jerk beef and talking about their day.
sentences.chinese: 他們圍着篝火喫着牛肉乾並談論着他們這一天的生活。

sentences.english: And then he showed us the food - beef jerky .
sentences.chinese: 然後他向我們展示食品牛肉乾。

sentences.english: The salted preserved beef is always good to boost the muscles.
sentences.chinese: 用鹽醃製的牛肉乾對有助於拉伸肌肉。

definition: pineapple cake, traditional Taiwanese sweet pastry
suncake (small round cake made with flaky pastry and a maltose filling, originally from Taichung, Taiwan)
food preserved in sugar or honey
West Point, US military academy in New York
rice ball (steamed rice formed into a ball and stuffed with various fillings)/onigiri (Japanese-style rice ball)
jelly snack made by kneading jelly fig seeds 愛玉子|爱玉子[ai4 yu4 zi3] in water and combining with flavorings (popular in Taiwan and Singapore)
